title: you country is banned from this server 解决
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content:
进不去服务器
显示
you country is banned from this server

求解决

replies.author: 骷髅大银
replies.txt_content: 我猜你用的Authme插件吧，你所在的国家不能进入这个服务器。用这个吧。

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
